import React from "react" import "./style.css" import LoadingOverlay from "react-loading-overlay" import PaperPlane from "../../svg/paperplane.svg" import InfoCircle from "../../svg/info-circle.svg" import OverlayTrigger from "react-bootstrap/OverlayTrigger" import Popover from "react-bootstrap/Popover" const CenterForm = ({ threads, selectedThread, formData, handleChangeForm, sendForm, command, handleChange, showTextField, textFieldValue, setTextFieldValue, sendCommands, deleteGeneration, regenerateGeneration, delilahWorking, }) => { const isFormSubmitted = threads.find((thread) => thread.id === selectedThread)?.generations .length > 0 const handleChangeTextField = (e) => { setTextFieldValue(e.target.value) } const sendFormComponent = () => { return (
{ e.preventDefault() sendForm() }} > {/* Center Form*/}
